member.name: P:ExcelExporter.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ExcelExporter.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ExcelExporter.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:ExcelExporter.ExcelExporter.ExportToExcel(System.Data.DataTable,System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Load the pieces of XML spreadsheet (Excel) template, fill them with data and concatenate them to form a valid XML file.
member.remarks: Excel spreadsheet can be saved as XML file. The principle of this method is to prepare the Excel with XML spreadsheet templates.

member.name: M:ExcelExporter.ExcelExporter.AttachRows(System.Data.DataTable,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Fill data to each row with the XML row template.
member.param: DataTable containing the data of all the rows to be exported
DataTable index of the first row in the current page
DataTable index of the last row in the current page
StringBuilder concantenating each XML piece templates
member.remarks: It fills data for one single page of the spreadsheet in each invoke.

member.name: T:ExcelExporter.ExcelExporter
member.summary: This class takes in data in the type of DataTable and output a string in XML spreadsheet format.
